ids_properties.ids_properties.source.documentation: Source of the data (any comment describing the origin of the data : code, path to diagnostic signals, processing method, ...)

ids_properties.ids_properties.provider.documentation: Name of the person in charge of producing this data

ids_properties.ids_properties.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

ids_properties.ids_properties.comment.documentation: Any comment describing the content of this IDS

ids_properties.ids_properties.homogeneou.documentation: 1 if the time of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the time values for this IDS are stored in ../time just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various time fields at lower levels in the tree.

ids_properties.ids_properties.creation_d.documentation: Date at which this data has been produced
